# MTLComputePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptorArray

**Class**

A container that stores an array of sample buffer attachments for a compute pass.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLComputePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptorArray
```

## Overview

The number of elements in the array is at least the number of elements in an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/counterSets] property.

## Accessing a sample buffer attachment

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the descriptor object for the specified sample buffer attachment.

## Configuring a compute pass

- **MTLComputePassDescriptor**: A description of how to dispatch execution of pass commands and GPU performance sampling.
- **MTLDispatchType**: The type of dispatch method to use when calling encoded functions.
- **MTLDispatchThreadgroupsIndirectArguments**: The data layout required for arguments needed to specify the size of threadgroups.
- **MTLComputePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor**: A configuration that instructs the GPU where to store counter data from the beginning and end of a compute pass.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
